column5: Spacious rare custom Oceanfront (streetside)/Oceanview 4 bedroom, 2 bath home with the Living Area/Kitchen on the TOP floor! Panoramic views all the way to county beach on a clear day from this Surfside Beach Texas vacation home property! (See photos for exact location on the street).
